diskUtilities

Class DiskManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • diskUtilities.DiskManager

  • public class DiskManager
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DiskManager()
      Creates a manager that will handle the names of the disks that get created.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDisk(java.lang.String diskName)
      Add the name of a disk to the list of disk names.
      void deleteDisk(java.lang.String diskName)
      Deletes a disk from the directory of disks called "DiskUnits".
      int findDiskNameIndex(java.lang.String diskName)
      Search for the name of a disk in the array of disk names.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDiskNames()
      Return an array of strings corresponding to the names of the disks created.

      • getDiskNames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDiskNames()
        Return an array of strings corresponding to the names of the disks created.
        Returns:

      • addDisk

        public void addDisk(java.lang.String diskName)
        Add the name of a disk to the list of disk names.
        Parameters:
        diskName - the name of the disk to be added.

      • deleteDisk

        public void deleteDisk(java.lang.String diskName)
        Deletes a disk from the directory of disks called "DiskUnits". After that, the name is removed from the array of disk names.
        Parameters:
        diskName - the name of the disk to be deleted.

      • findDiskNameIndex

        public int findDiskNameIndex(java.lang.String diskName)
        Search for the name of a disk in the array of disk names.
        Parameters:
        diskName -
        Returns:
        the index of the position where the disk name is, returns -1 if it doesn't exist.
